main event: A UFO was sighted over Springfield, Ohio on October 5, 1962, reportedly moving automatically and disappearing into a cloud.
interesting points: The object was described as being initially a pinpoint that increased in size and then disappeared without leaving a trail,The sighting lasted approximately 20 minutes,The weather at the time included clouds, which may have affected visibility,There were multiple reports of observations from different individuals around the same date,The object was concluded to have insufficient data for identification, suggesting possible atmospheric conditions.
witness description: A driver and passenger in a parked car
